meaning list.sentence translation: ទោះ​បី​ជា​មាន​ការ​លំបាក​យ៉ាង​ណា​ក៏​ដោយ ក៏​លោក​បាន​រក្សា​ក្តី​សុបិន​របស់​ខ្លួន​ដែរ។

meaning list.meaning: ដើម្បីនៅឱ្យឆ្ងាយ, មិនទៅជិត
meaning list.sentence: Please keep off the grass.
meaning list.sentence translation: សូម​នៅ​ឲ្យ​ឆ្ងាយ​ពី​ស្មៅ។

meaning list.meaning: ការពារ, រក្សាឱ្យឆ្ងាយ
meaning list.sentence: He tried to keep off unhealthy food.
meaning list.sentence translation: គាត់​បាន​ព្យាយាម​នៅ​ឲ្យ​ឆ្ងាយ​ពី​អាហារ​ដែល​មិន​ល្អ​ចំពោះ​សុខភាព។

meaning list.meaning: ចាប់ផ្តើមមានប្រសិទ្ធិភាព
meaning list.sentence: The painkillers took a while to kick in.
meaning list.sentence translation: វាត្រូវការពេលវេលាខ្លះដើម្បីឱ្យថ្នាំបំបាត់ការឈឺចាប់មានប្រសិទ្ធភាព។

meaning list.meaning: រួមចំណែក, ផ្តល់ការគាំទ្រ
meaning list.sentence: Everyone kicked in some money for the gift.
meaning list.sentence translation: អ្នក​រាល់​គ្នា​បាន​បរិច្ចាគ​ប្រាក់​ខ្លះ​ដល់​អំណោយ។

meaning list.meaning: គោះចេញ, គោះចេញ
meaning list.sentence: The boxer knocked out his opponent in the second round.
meaning list.sentence translation: អ្នក​ប្រដាល់​រូបនេះ​ផ្ដួល​គូប្រកួត​ឱ្យ​សន្លប់​នៅ​ទឹក​ទី​២ ។

meaning list.meaning: ដើម្បីភ្ញាក់ផ្អើល, ចាប់អារម្មណ៍
meaning list.sentence: The performance completely knocked me out.
meaning list.sentence translation: ខ្ញុំ​ត្រូវ​បាន​ផ្លុំ​ចេញ​ទាំង​ស្រុង​ដោយ​ការ​បង្ហាញ​។

meaning list.meaning: ដើម្បីផ្តួលរំលំ, ផ្តួលរំលំ
meaning list.sentence: He accidentally knocked over the glass.
meaning list.sentence translation: គាត់បានគោះកញ្ចក់ដោយចៃដន្យ។

meaning list.meaning: ប្លន់ (ជាពិសេសហាង ឬធនាគារ)
meaning list.sentence: The robbers knocked over a small convenience store.
meaning list.sentence translation: ចោរចូលប្លន់ផ្សារតូច។

meaning list.meaning: រៀបចំ, រៀបចំផែនការ
meaning list.sentence: She laid out all her ideas for the new project.
meaning list.sentence translation: គាត់បានរៀបចំគំនិតរបស់គាត់ទាំងអស់សម្រាប់គម្រោងថ្មី។

meaning list.meaning: ចំណាយ (លុយ)
meaning list.sentence: He laid out a lot of money for the new car.
meaning list.sentence translation: គាត់បានចំណាយប្រាក់យ៉ាងច្រើនលើឡានថ្មី។

meaning list.meaning: ទុកចោល
meaning list.sentence: She left behind her old life and moved to a new city.
meaning list.sentence translation: គាត់បានចាកចេញពីជីវិតចាស់របស់គាត់ហើយផ្លាស់ទៅទីក្រុងថ្មី។

meaning list.meaning: ភ្លេចនៅពីក្រោយ
meaning list.sentence: He left his phone behind at the restaurant.
meaning list.sentence translation: គាត់ភ្លេចទូរស័ព្ទនៅភោជនីយដ្ឋាន។

meaning list.meaning: ដើម្បីចាកចេញ, បញ្ឈប់
meaning list.sentence: Let’s pick up where we left off yesterday.
meaning list.sentence translation: សូមបន្តកន្លែងដែលយើងបានចាកចេញកាលពីម្សិលមិញ។

meaning list.meaning: ឈប់ធ្វើអ្វីមួយ
meaning list.sentence: He finally left off smoking.
meaning list.sentence translation: ទីបំផុតគាត់ឈប់ជក់បារី។

meaning list.meaning: អនុញ្ញាតឱ្យចេញ
meaning list.sentence: She let the dog out into the garden.
meaning list.sentence translation: គាត់បានឱ្យឆ្កែចេញនៅក្នុងសួនច្បារ។

meaning list.meaning: ធ្វើឱ្យមានសំលេងរំខាន (ស្រែកសើច)
meaning list.sentence: He let out a loud laugh.
meaning list.sentence translation: គាត់សើចខ្លាំងៗ។

meaning list.meaning: បំពេញតាមការរំពឹងទុក
meaning list.sentence: The movie didn’t live up to my expectations.
meaning list.sentence translation: ភាពយន្ត​នេះ​មិន​បាន​បំពេញ​តាម​ការ​រំពឹង​ទុក​របស់​ខ្ញុំ​ទេ។

meaning list.meaning: រស់នៅតាមស្តង់ដារ
meaning list.sentence: She tried to live up to her family’s high standards.
meaning list.sentence translation: គាត់ព្យាយាមរស់នៅតាមស្តង់ដារខ្ពស់របស់គ្រួសារគាត់។

meaning list.meaning: ចាក់សោ
meaning list.sentence: Make sure you lock up the house before you leave.
meaning list.sentence translation: ត្រូវប្រាកដថាអ្នកចាក់សោផ្ទះមុនពេលចាកចេញ។

meaning list.meaning: ដាក់គុក
meaning list.sentence: The criminal was locked up for ten years.
meaning list.sentence translation: ឧក្រិដ្ឋជន​ត្រូវ​បាន​ជាប់​គុក​ដប់​ឆ្នាំ។

meaning list.meaning: មើលងាយ, មើលងាយ
meaning list.sentence: You shouldn’t look down on people who are less fortunate.
meaning list.sentence translation: អ្នក​មិន​គួរ​មើល​ងាយ​មនុស្ស​ដែល​មាន​សំណាង​តិច​នោះ​ទេ។

meaning list.meaning: ដើម្បីស៊ើបអង្កេត, ពិនិត្យ
meaning list.sentence: The police are looking into the cause of the fire.
meaning list.sentence translation: ប៉ូលិស​កំពុង​ស៊ើបអង្កេត​រក​មូលហេតុ​នៃ​ការ​ឆេះ​នេះ​។

meaning list.meaning: យកចិត្តទុកដាក់, តាមដាន
meaning list.sentence: Look out for cars when crossing the street.
meaning list.sentence translation: សូមប្រយ័ត្នចំពោះរថយន្តពេលឆ្លងកាត់ផ្លូវ។

meaning list.meaning: គាំទ្រនរណាម្នាក់
meaning list.sentence: She always looks out for her younger brother.
meaning list.sentence translation: គាត់តែងតែមើលថែប្អូនប្រុសរបស់គាត់។

meaning list.meaning: ដើម្បីពិនិត្យ, ពិនិត្យ
meaning list.sentence: I looked through the documents before signing them.
meaning list.sentence translation: ខ្ញុំបានពិនិត្យឯកសារមុនពេលចុះហត្ថលេខា។

meaning list.meaning: មិនអើពើ
meaning list.sentence: He looked through me as if I wasn’t there.
meaning list.sentence translation: គាត់មិនអើពើខ្ញុំ ដូចជាខ្ញុំមិននៅទីនោះ។

meaning list.meaning: ដើម្បីរត់គេចខ្លួន
meaning list.sentence: The thieves made off with the stolen jewelry.
meaning list.sentence translation: ចោរបានរត់គេចខ្លួនជាមួយគ្រឿងអលង្ការដែលគេលួច។

meaning list.meaning: លាយបញ្ចូលគ្នា (វត្ថុ ឬមនុស្ស)
meaning list.sentence: I mixed up the files and gave him the wrong one.
meaning list.sentence translation: ខ្ញុំ​បាន​ឆ្លង​កាត់​ឯកសារ​ហើយ​ឲ្យ​គាត់​ខុស។

meaning list.meaning: ច្រឡំ
meaning list.sentence: The confusing instructions really mixed me up.
meaning list.sentence translation: ខ្ញុំពិតជាភ្ញាក់ផ្អើលចំពោះការណែនាំដែលច្រឡំ។

meaning list.meaning: ផ្លាស់ទីត្រឡប់មកវិញ
meaning list.sentence: He moved back to his hometown after retirement.
meaning list.sentence translation: ក្រោយ​ចូល​និវត្តន៍ លោក​បាន​ផ្លាស់​ទៅ​ស្រុក​កំណើត​វិញ។

meaning list.meaning: ដកថយ
meaning list.sentence: Please move back so everyone can see.
meaning list.sentence translation: សូមក្រោកឈរឡើងវិញ ដើម្បីអោយអ្នកទាំងអស់គ្នាបានឃើញ។

meaning list.meaning: រៀបចំបន្ទប់, បោះជំហានទៅម្ខាង
meaning list.sentence: Can you move over so I can sit down?
meaning list.sentence translation: តើអ្នកអាចដើរចេញដើម្បីអោយខ្ញុំអង្គុយបានទេ?

meaning list.meaning: ដួលសន្លប់
meaning list.sentence: He passed out from the heat.
meaning list.sentence translation: គាត់បានសន្លប់ដោយសារកំដៅ។

meaning list.meaning: ចែកចាយ (ឯកសារជាដើម)
meaning list.sentence: The teacher passed out the test papers.
meaning list.sentence translation: គ្រូ​ចែក​ក្រដាស​ប្រឡង។

meaning list.meaning: បង់លុយយ៉ាងច្រើន
meaning list.sentence: The insurance company paid out a large sum.
meaning list.sentence translation: ក្រុមហ៊ុនធានារ៉ាប់រងបានបង់ប្រាក់យ៉ាងច្រើន។

meaning list.meaning: ញ៉ាំដោយស្ទាក់ស្ទើរ
meaning list.sentence: He picked at his food but didn’t really eat much.
meaning list.sentence translation: គាត់​ញ៉ាំ​អាហារ​ដោយ​ស្ទាក់ស្ទើរ ប៉ុន្តែ​មិន​បាន​ញ៉ាំ​ច្រើន​ទេ។

meaning list.meaning: រិះគន់រកកំហុស
meaning list.sentence: She keeps picking at everything I do.
meaning list.sentence translation: គាត់រកឃើញកំហុសនៅក្នុងអ្វីគ្រប់យ៉ាងដែលខ្ញុំធ្វើ។

meaning list.meaning: បំបែក
meaning list.sentence: He pulled apart the engine to see what was wrong.
meaning list.sentence translation: គាត់​បាន​យក​ម៉ាស៊ីន​ដាច់​ចេញ ហើយ​ឃើញ​ថា​មាន​បញ្ហា​អ្វី។

meaning list.meaning: ការ​បំបែក​ខ្លួន (ប្រយុទ្ធ​នឹង​មនុស្ស​។ ល។ )
meaning list.sentence: They had to pull the two boys apart.
meaning list.sentence translation: ពួកគេត្រូវបំបែកកូនទាំងពីរ។

meaning list.meaning: ដើម្បីជោគជ័យ
meaning list.sentence: He managed to pull off a difficult project.
meaning list.sentence translation: គាត់បានគ្រប់គ្រងដើម្បីសម្រេចបាននូវគម្រោងដ៏លំបាកមួយ។

meaning list.meaning: ខិតជិតផ្លូវ
meaning list.sentence: The car pulled off to the side of the road.
meaning list.sentence translation: រថយន្ត​បើក​មក​ដល់​ចិញ្ចើម​ផ្លូវ ។

meaning list.meaning: ទាញចេញ, ទាញចេញ
meaning list.sentence: She pulled out a notebook from her bag.
meaning list.sentence translation: គាត់បានយកសៀវភៅកត់ត្រាចេញពីកាបូបរបស់គាត់។

meaning list.meaning: ដកខ្លួនចេញពីសកម្មភាព
meaning list.sentence: The company pulled out of the deal at the last minute.
meaning list.sentence translation: ក្រុមហ៊ុនបានដកខ្លួនចេញពីកិច្ចព្រមព្រៀងនៅនាទីចុងក្រោយ។

meaning list.meaning: ដាក់នៅនឹងកន្លែង
meaning list.sentence: Please put the books back on the shelf.
meaning list.sentence translation: សូមដាក់សៀវភៅឡើងវិញនៅលើធ្នើ។

meaning list.meaning: ពន្យារពេល, ពន្យារពេល
meaning list.sentence: The meeting was put back by an hour.
meaning list.sentence translation: កិច្ចប្រជុំត្រូវបានពន្យារពេលមួយម៉ោង។

meaning list.meaning: ភ្ជាប់តាមទូរស័ព្ទ
meaning list.sentence: Can you put me through to the manager?
meaning list.sentence translation: តើអ្នកអាចភ្ជាប់ខ្ញុំទៅអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងបានទេ?

meaning list.meaning: បង្ហាញពីស្ថានភាពលំបាក
meaning list.sentence: She was put through a lot of stress during the exam.
meaning list.sentence translation: គាត់​ត្រូវ​ប្រឈម​នឹង​ភាព​តានតឹង​ជា​ច្រើន​ក្នុង​ពេល​ប្រឡង។

meaning list.sentence: I can't put up with his rude behavior anymore.
meaning list.sentence translation: ខ្ញុំ​មិន​អាច​ទ្រាំទ្រ​នឹង​ទង្វើ​ឈ្លើយ​របស់​គាត់​បាន​ទៀត​ទេ។

meaning list.meaning: ហែកហួរ សុំលុយច្រើនពេក
meaning list.sentence: The shop ripped me off by charging double the price.
meaning list.sentence translation: ហាង​បាន​ហែក​ខ្ញុំ​ដោយ​គិត​ថ្លៃ​ខ្ញុំ​ពីរដង។

meaning list.meaning: ហែកចេញ, បំបែក
meaning list.sentence: He ripped off the tag from his new shirt.
meaning list.sentence translation: គាត់​បាន​ហែក​ស្លាក​អាវ​ថ្មី​របស់​គាត់ ហើយ​យក​វា​ទៅ។

meaning list.meaning: ដាក់លើទីផ្សារ ផ្សព្វផ្សាយ
meaning list.sentence: The company rolled out its new product last month.
meaning list.sentence translation: ក្រុមហ៊ុនបានបើកដំណើរការផលិតផលថ្មីរបស់ខ្លួនកាលពីខែមុន។

meaning list.meaning: ដើម្បីបើក, រីករាលដាល
meaning list.sentence: They rolled out the carpet for the guests.
meaning list.sentence translation: ពួកគេបានក្រាលកំរាលព្រំសម្រាប់ភ្ញៀវ។

meaning list.meaning: រត់ត្រឡប់មកវិញ
